reqs:
Pre-reqs: MICB 306.
This class will be held in the Life Sciences Centre (LSC), room 1416 (effective May 28, 2016).
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
This course is credit excluded with PATH 437.
description: Interactions between viruses and humans; pathogenesis; persistence and viral oncogenesis; virological diagnosis and treatment. (Consult the Credit Exclusion list within the Faculty of Science section of the Calendar.)
